channel.title: Freebsd on Victor's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Freebsd on Victor's Blog

item.title: ZFS for Dummies
item.description: As mentioned on previous posts, I have spent the past few weeks dealing with a ZFS crash on my FreeNAS install. Because of that, not only was I forced to learn how to troubleshoot ZFS, but I also had to learn how to setup new volumes and come up with new backup strategies (between a few other things). This was a great opportunity for me to learn more about ZFS (because I new ‘nada’ to start with).
